name: Spectral Overdrive
description:
In a world where spirits run rampant, it's up to you to save it with a little "Vehicular Ghost-Slaughter"

Spectral Overdrive is a little top-down arcade game about hunting ghosts with your hovercar! Zoom around and ram your vehicle into ghosts for some fun, spooky action!

  • MENU CONFIRM:
    • SPACE Key / ENTER Key
  • MENU SELECT:
    • UP and Down Arrow Keys
  • MOVEMENT:
    • Arrow Keys
  • BOOST:
    • SPACE + UP Arrow Key
  • PAUSE:
    • ESC Key 

Programming and Art by: BadSprite aka Kenny Tran
Music by: Tallbeard Studios via [Music Assets] FREE Chiptune Music LoopsSound Effects by: Beep Yeah! via 8-Bit Sound Effects [100+ SFX]

Bonus Note:
This is the second game I've ever published on Itch! I'm still new to the game dev scene, so I'd appreciate any feedback you'd like to share!
